attributes.action: make it manadatory that a convicted person found guilty of murdering a person through a gun or knife related crime must serve a life sentence without parole or release
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK, LIFE does not mean LIFE for those convicted of serious offences. In many cases it has been argued successfully that LIFE can mean a few years behind bars before the "debt to society" has been paid. This is not a deterrent as the rise in gun and knife culture proves. LIFE must mean LIFE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
